column2: My friends and I spend a week in San Fran in 2020 and we came here for breakfast on a first morning… and every morning after that.  Fantastic sandwiches with decent price and great coffee. Also the Ladies who work there made us feel welcome every day. Nice little place and delicious food.  Highly recommended!
Simple café with good selection of breakfast items. Quick and friendly, well priced for SF.
Great little breakfast nook. Breakfast burrito’s are awesome and very fairly priced!
Great food at decent prices! Lost of people who come in here for their morning fix literally.
Tasty, inexpensive breakfast options. Can't go wrong with the bacon, egg, and cheese croissant or the San Francisco bagel. Limited seating, no free WiFi. Credit card minimum of $5.
Came here hungover one Saturday morning. Left rejuvenated and feeling like a new man. Delicious breakfast burritos and bagel sandwiches. Restaurant is super clean, and the employees are so friendly.
Wow. Delicious sandwiches, great coffee, great prices and good service. What more could you ask for? A++
Awesome little breakfast find. Great bagels and a cosy little place 👍👍 Decent prices! …

Good value for breakfast and nice service. The bagels are from Costco and eggs and ham a little skimpy, though the whole bagel sandwich was hot and tasty, hit the spot. I'd go back if on the go, but not to go out of my way for.
. Staff was very nice. Coffee and service were excellent. Despite another guest being rude, staff handled it very well. Would definitely recommend.
Great neighborhood cafe! Sitting on the sidewalk catching up with friends and neighbors. Delicious food and good coffee. The tuna melt with everything on it is definitely my favorite.

Unbeatable prices, decent food, friendly service. Always some characters hanging around here. If you're expecting NY-style lox, prepare to be kinda disappointed, even though the $7 pricetag is fantastic. Go for the $5 breakfast sandwich instead!
My go-to neighborhood cafe! The ladies who work here are total sweeties, and the coffee and food is good. This isn't Ritual or something super trendy, but a nice comfortable neighborhood spot.
Took 20 minutes to order 2 sandwiches then another 20 to receive them. No one in line, just super slow. Not worth your time. I can’t imagine when there are people in line, it must be over an hour.
Great taste, a little pricey
Great place to grab light breakfast and coffee early in the morning as it opens 7am. Their coffee was great. Their bagels are thin and light which I liked
Seven bucks pays for your selection of breakfast sandwich, large coffee that is very good, one pastry of your choice, piece of fruit, and a bottle of water.
This is my daily breakfast stop, perfect for a quick bite and the food quality is great for the price!
Great little breakfast spot!! Amazing prices, and the staff are super friendly!
The coffee is always nice and hot. It's a great neighborhood spot for a quick bite and a smile from the staff.
I love this place. Thank you for opening so early.
Lovely little cafe, great food, staff helpful. The best coffee I've had in America yet!!!
Makes the best scrambled eggs and best grill cheese with turkey  avocado.
Excellent breakfast burrito! I really gotta try the bacon or turkey one next time.
Very friendly staff and great coffee. Also only place open this early on a Saturday
Nothing too fancy - just a nice, low-key spot. Try the egg salad sandwich
Best breakfast spot in SF with delicious bagels!
Such nice people and great cheap food!
Inexpensive and good food. Owners are awesome.
Clean and Friendly staff.  French Roast coffe was good
Awesome Bagels!!! Best with maple syrup! Greetings from Germany
Great place to start your day. Try the breakfast sandwich!
An excellent neighborhood breakfast/lunch spot.
Cute little coffee shop with breakfast and lunch items
Delicious breakfast croissant, great chai too
Good food and friendly hostess.
Good cheap and fast.
Love their California bagels
Best breakfast sandwich
Yummy breakfast sandwiches!
Disgrace to bacon egg and cheeses
I love this place!
Great bagels
Small coffee in the middle of San Francisco. The selection is very good. The bagels are highly recommended.
I come here often for breakfast bagels. The price is reasonable. There are two tables outside.
About $5 for egg ham cheese on an English muffin. Coffee is about $2. If the payment amount is $5 or more, you can pay with an IC compatible credit card or debit card.
Good place for very kind breakfasts thank you 🙂 😉 …
Good place to have breakfast with a reasonable pvp and without pretensions
